trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Anger vad som händer när ett arbetsflöde blir inaktiv när beständiga tillåts.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>funktionen anropas när Schemaläggaren har inga fler väntande arbetsobjekt och arbetsflödets körtid kan bevara.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Observera att den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>funktionen anropas när beständiga inte tillåts, och båda <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>och <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>anropas i den ordningen när beständiga tillåts.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
trans-unit.target: Ingen är standardåtgärden om inget <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>hanterare har angetts.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no action is taken.
Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> ska spara arbetsflödet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Anger att den <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> bör kvarstår och ta bort arbetsflödet.
